body.name: SRhonyra Radeon RX 580 8GB GDDR5 Graphics Card White PCB for Gaming PC Video Card 2048SP 256-Bit PCIe 3.0 x16 6-Pin Connector 2 Cooling Fan Desktop Computer Gaming GPU with HDMI DisplayPort & DVI Port
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 44 mins
features: Perfect Performance for Gaming - This is Radeon RX 580 white PCB edition, which is a performance-segment graphics card with AMD chipsets made by SRhonyra, builit on the 14nm process, equiped with 2048 stream processors, parired with 8GB GDDR5 RAM runs at 1750MHz, supports you game decently never by making some sacrifices in video settings, faster FPS and better performance.

Enhancing Cooling Performance - This RX 580 8GB graphics card is equipped not only with two powerful semi-automatic intelligent fans system with intelligent controller, but also premium pure copper heat pipe to faster transfer the heat into the fin array for heat dissipation, keeping your PC in low regulated temperatures, and the graphics work perfectly while gaming.

High Definiation Multiple Displays - RX 580 8GB video card has 3 output ports including 1×HDMI 2.0, 1×DisplayPort 1.4 and 1×DVI, support max siultaneous 3 displays, enable your PC work great as multitasking workstation meanwhile a gaming PC, will be sure to change your working and gaming experience.

Great Value for the Money - No matter you want to upgrade your old video card, to build up a new PC for your kids, or If you're an everyday user who just needs quality graphics at a reasonable price, SRhonyra RX580 gaming graphics card could meet your requests well.

Durable & Independently Powered - Being a dual-slot width video card, the AMD Radeon RX 580 grpahics card takes 1×PCIe 3.0 x16 lane, and plus a 6-pin connector for external power, max power consumption 120 Watts. If you have any questions on the card, please contact me freely through amazon messenger, we will get back to you within 24 hours.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 70 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SRhonyra Radeon RX 580 8GB White PCB gaming graphics card Gaming the best with SRhonyra RX 580 8GB video card (White PCB Edition) The SRhonyra RX 580 8GB graphics card is a great option for those looking for an affordable graphics card that offers good performance and value. It is still a capable graphics card that can handle most modern games and applications, providing a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience. This GPU has 8GB VRAM, which is still enough for most games, even those with high graphics settings, ensuring smooth gameplay without any lag or stuttering. Moreover, the power consumption of SRhonyra RX 580 8GB video card is around 100 ~ 120 Watts, which means it can be used with lower-powered systems or with a lower wattage power supply. You don't need to upgarde your PSU. The RX 580 8GB graphics card is compatible with a wide range of systems and motherboards, making it an easy upgrade option for many users. AMD continues to release regular driver updates for the RX 580, improving performance and compatibility with newer games and applications. Its compatibility with a wide range of systems, good cooling solutions, and driver support make it an excellent choice for gamers, content creators, and other users who want a reliable graphics card that won't break the bank. Gaming the best and have fun!

Semi-automatic Intelligent Fans System Semi-automatic intelligent fans system stops the fan completely when the GPU temperature remains below 55°C, letting you enjoy light gaming in complete silence. Paired 2 quiet ball bearing fan for longer life span. Optimized Composite Heatpipe SRhonyra RX 580 8gb gaming graphics card has 2 copper tubes that covered on the aluminum heat sink same as our RX 580 8gb, ensure the heat can be quickly transmitted to the air from the fan through the heat sink. High-Quality Components for stable performance This gaming graphics card is built with high-quality components that ensure its high performance, reliable and durable capability for all kinds of gamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY GOOD GPU
reviews.reviewText: Dude this is a VERY GOOD GPU I bought this for an upgrade bacause I couldn’t find Msi rx580 so I bought this one not expecting it to work but it’s amazing if you look at other ratings and they say bad it’s a lie yes the driver website is Chinese buuuutttt you can just use OG amd drivers by going to there web and downloading the rx580 8gb drivers and it works good this is a perfect gpu for my needs/13 year old gaming but it’s pretty good for f GTA and Fortnite is pretty mid but playable just know this is a good GPU i really recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4GB RX550 POWER HOUSE
reviews.reviewText: Other than longevity I can tell you this 4GB RX550 is amazing. AMD Adrenalin software loaded the correct driver and software addons from AMD's website. Just download AMD Adrenalin software and it'll do the rest. No need to get the manufactuers download. I purchased this card to complete a project by replacing an MSI RX560 that was acting flakey and unstable. I was shocked to see this thing run circles around the MSI card. After all this RX550 is supposed to run slower. Belive it or not I'm running MSFS2020 at medium settings with it. It's flawless. Don't know what all they put into it but I'm getting alot out of it for the price. $79 for a RX550 that runs as good as a 4GB RX560 and approaches the performance of my RX570 at half the price and power consumption. Seems to be running well under 50W. I tested it on an external GDC Beast powered by a 12V 6a power adapter and it ran flawless there as well. I recomend this GPU and I'm temted to buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Budget Gaming Card for under $100
reviews.reviewText: No driver problems for me Installed restarted Windows and poof driver auto installed. I gamed on it, worked fine. I dont think card is loud. But it is BIG! Compared to my other Chinese RX 590 I dont notice any difference with this RX 580 and its 30$ cheaper and extended add on warranty is $10 bucks cheaper because its under $99. Only run it for a week but its Flawless performance, Good movie play back too. Im pleased so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great price, but odd drivers, and 6 pin power
reviews.reviewText: using this to replace a dead nvidia gtx 970, this looked like a great price, and since my motherboard only supported PCIe 3 I couldn't upgrade much.my pc sounds a little louder than before but i had to replace my power supply at the same time, so i'm not sure which caused the noise increase.My PC is again able to runs games like Satisfactory on normal settings.I was a little distraught that the power slot only takes 6 pins, but eventually found out 2 pins come off of one of my 8 pin power cords.the user manual (v1.0) says"Go to www.szsongrui.com or GPU chipsets official website to download the drivers for this card based on the operating system."there are 6 downloads for this card, (3 fast 3 slow)the top one is not labeled, but hovering over it shows a file name that indicates windows 7the middle one is labeled for windows 10, and is from 2019.the bottom one is labeled for windows 11, but the file name indicates it should work for windows 10 also, and is from 2022.but here is the odd part, if you click a download button, a download does not start.if you wait, your screen will go black, and then come back on and adjust resolution and the drivers are installed for you, no menus, nothing to click or see, no history of a downloaded file in my downloads folder nor my browsers downloads folder. they must have some sort of script that puts it in temp space and headlessly handles the installation, but that is unexpected and scary.Feeling like I might have installed a virus along with my graphics drivers I ran a virus scan and it came back clean. So perhaps everything is okay.Giving "Tech Support" a 2 star rating for how their website handles downloads.included the user manual incase anyone else needs to see it before buying, useful information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slightly older card, but still works great.
reviews.reviewText: I was replacing an old Gateway that I nursed along for an extra decade, but it was never going to be Win11 compatible, so I scrapped it and built a new one from scratch. I was using an old video card from the Gateway and it worked fine with the new PC I built, but my son had been pestering me about building a starter gamer PC. With the rebuild, I decided to go part of the way on that, but wound up doing way better than I had anticipated on the gamer front.This card went in when I found it for $89.50. Knowing it had the capability to play the Epic Spiderman Reboot, I decided to give it a go. Well, I'm happy because it serves our tv and monitor with HDMI cords and it renders the Spiderman game on the tv to the point I thought he was watching a movie. Crystal clear on both outputs for movies or computing and no skipped frames or pixelation on the game.The only way it will lose stars if it doesn't last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is a Chinese board
reviews.reviewText: Just getting it going, but it is a Chinese video card and you have to translate web site and i had to use 2 browser to get it to work more to follow once i get it tested out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the SRhonyra Radeon RX 580 8GB GDDR5 to replace an older GPU which was failing to deliver HD videos reliably. So far the RX 580 GPU has handled all HD video that my family has been enjoying to watch. Now, I know this GPU is not a real RX 580, due to the fact it uses 2048SP, I consider this GPU to be an RX 575 :) My computer has AMD Adrenalin 23.7.2 software installed, all I did was to install the SRhonyra Radeon RX 580 and it booted up. Once my computer was up, Adrenalin showed a dialog box telling me to reboot in-order to install new GPU drivers. The process of installation couldn't have been easier! In reality I'm glad SRhonyra didn't supply me with a software disk. Like my title states this GPU exceeds my expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Card didn’t work out of the box and I wasn’t able to get a refund that’s what I get for buying from an untrusted site oh wait this is Amazon it’s not what it used to be sadly such a same it’s now a sell out company.
